title: Let's Talk About New vs Used Laptops
description: 5 years of evolution have brought some major upgrades to laptops. Learn more about 8th Gen Intel Core i7:  This video is sponsored by Intel. HP Pavilion x360:   Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:

Having this level of performance in such a thin and light laptop just wasn't possible all that long ago. And it's hard for me to imagine much of a better time to upgrade than now.
